wikipedia_page.main: John Patrick (10 January 1870-unknown) was a Scottish footballer who played in the 1890s.Patrick was born in Kilsyth, and after playing for Grangemouth and Falkirk he joined St Mirren. In 1896 he had a trial in the Football League with Everton but he only played one league game before returning to St Mirren. He represented the Scottish Football League on two occasions.He made his debut for the Scotland national football team on 20 March 1897 against Wales in Wrexham. His second and final cap for Scotland came two weeks later against England.
